headline: Lululemon Founder Turns Up the Heat in Proxy Fight
summary: Chip Wilson sent a letter to shareholders urging a board revamp after his attempts to reach a compromise were rebuffed.

headline: lululemon Responds to Chip Wilson’s Statements
summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, February 27, 2026--lululemon athletica inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) ("lululemon" or the "company") today commented on Chip Wilson’s press release in relation to his nomination of three director candidates to stand for election to the company’s Board at lululemon’s 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders:

headline: Lululemon Founder Chip Wilson Escalates Proxy Fight With Shareholder Letter

headline: Lululemon Founder Intensifies Board Battle, Cites Weak Governance, Strategic Drift
summary: Chip Wilson, founder of lululemon athletica, intensified his campaign against the company, accusing the board of weak governance and slow engagement as he pushes for sweeping changes.

raw.headline: Lululemon Founder Intensifies Board Battle, Cites Weak Governance, Strategic Drift
raw.summary: Chip Wilson, founder of lululemon athletica, intensified his campaign against the company, accusing the board of weak governance and slow engagement as he pushes for sweeping changes.

headline: Lululemon Expands Global Footprint As Strength Training Push Adds Complexity
summary: Lululemon athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) has opened its 100th EMEA store, marking its first entry into Poland. The company plans to expand into six new international markets in 2026 through its franchise partnership model. Lululemon has also launched its Unrestricted Power gym wear line, targeting strength training consumers. Lululemon athletica, trading at around $186.1, is rolling out fresh international growth initiatives at a time when its longer term share performance has been weak, with a...
